title: Qualcomm beats Canada’s Magna to buy Veoneer
dc:creator: Erica Ascher
description:
Reuters was 68 seconds ahead on Oct 4 with news that chipmaker Qualcomm and SSW Partners struck a deal to […]

The post Qualcomm beats Canada’s Magna to buy Veoneer appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters was 68 seconds ahead on Oct 4 with news that chipmaker Qualcomm and SSW Partners struck a deal to buy Swedish automotive technology group Veoneer for $4.5 billion, which canceled its previous acquisition deal with Magna.

The post Qualcomm beats Canada’s Magna to buy Veoneer appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
